item.title: First post of a new blog
item.description: A new blog comes alive Link to heading A few years ago, I used to blog on Medium. That was paused during COVID, but now I’m resuming the blogging effort here with a self-hosted version using the Hugo framework and Cloudflare Pages for serving. The main reason for this change is to have long-term control over my content and to use Git for version control. I don’t plan for this blog to be much more sophisticated in style than markdown with occasional images.
